content: संवरः {@--1@} Covering. {@--2@} Comprehension. {@--3@} Compression, contraction. {@--4@} A dam, bridge, causeway. {@--5@} A kind of deer. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon; see शंषर. --रं {@--1@} Concealment. {@--2@} Forbearance, self-control. {@--3@} Water. {@--4@} A particular religious observance (practised by Buddhists).
